===Overview===
The '''Gondorans''' were a tribe of [[humans]] living beneath a volcano in the city of [[Gondora]] within the [[Savage Land]]. they spent most of their history as a peaceful tribe living in seclusion, with the city and its people falling into myth.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 8}}

===Events===
They were forced by [[Montgomery Ford (Earth-616)|Montgomery Ford]], a visitor from the [[United States of America]], to build a large city in the dormant volcano. With this outsider influence the Gondorans fell into decadence and immorality much like the biblical Sodam and Gamorah. [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]] who had been tracking down [[Zabu (Earth-616)|Zabu]] who was brought to a decadent city of  Gondora. Ka-Zar freed Zabu and tried to help and rescue as many people as possible before the city was destroyed by the Volcano.{{r|Ka-Zar Vol 2 8}}
